:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Concurrent Dual-Band 11AC Wave 2 Indoor AP}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.edge-core.com/productsInfo.php?cls=3&cls2=18&cls3=138&id=312}} (-L version) This device might support 256QAM which could bump the 2.4GHz :802.11n speeds to a maximum of 400Mbps. The FCC entry covers: *[[Edge-corE ECW5211-O]] *[[Edge-corE ECW5211-L]] *[[Edge-corE ECW5211-L2]] {{See also|Edge-corE ECWO5211-L|Edge-corE|Accton}} __NOTOC__
